title: Gingerbread boys and girls
ingredients: ['75g butter', '200g dark brown soft sugar', '350ml treacle', '160ml cold water', '875g plain flour', '2 teaspoons bicarbonate of soda', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon ground allspice', '1 teaspoon ground ginger', '1 teaspoon crushed cloves (optional)', '1 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '2 egg yolks', '10 drops food colouring', '1/2 teaspoon water', '125g sultanas']
